full_summary:
<Title>
====

**Skylight Repairs at the Donnacona Institution**
======

**Procurement ID**: WS4247008447
**Solicitation Date**: December 5, 2023
**Closing Date**: January 25, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

**Bid opportunities for the skylight repairs project at the Donnacona Institution are now closed**.

**Project Overview**
---------------

The **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)** is issuing a request for proposal for **nonresidential building construction services** to replace the skylights at the Donnacona Institution, a correctional facility in Quebec.

**Bid Details**
-------------

* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services - CNST
* **Bid Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Delivery Location**: Donnacona, Quebec
* **Expected Contract Dates**: Not specified

**Eligibility and Instructions**
---------------------------

* The request for proposal document and supporting information can be downloaded from the **Ariba Network** website (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18195649?extsite=MTgxOTU2NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* All inquiries must be directed to **Veronique Hae Ok Pichette** at **veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**

**Contract Information**
-----------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Veronique Hae Ok Pichette, Email: veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca (No phone number or fax number is provided) 

**Language of Communication**
---------------------------

This procurement is advertised in both English and French. The selected bidder will be required to conduct all business related to the contract in the official language of the contract, as determined by the department.
